clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Tannic acid is indicated for cold sores fever blisters diaper rash minor burn or sunburn and prickly heat Vaginally tannic acid is used as a douche for leukorrhea It has been also indicated for sore throat inflamed tonsils spongy or receding gums and acute dermatitis

contraindications.disease: LD50 is 2 26 g Kg in rats
